TARGET.DESCRIPTION: This table is used for storing the RECN_SUMM_GID for the Recon snapshot, for the Recon Position (RCNT_RECN_EXTN_CLM) to be recorded in TRBI database.
TARGET.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding TSNAP.SNAP_ID for the Recon snapshot
TARGETFIELD.NAME: SNAP_ID

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE summary sequence number, generated
TARGETFIELD.NAME: RECN_SUMM_GID

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE value that represents TVNDR_REBT_C
TARGETFIELD.NAME: RECN_SUMM_TYP_CD

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the status for the Recon snapshot summary. If it is current and not be
TARGETFIELD.NAME: SNAP_STAT_CD

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the timestamp that the Informatica workflow created when the snapshot p
TARGETFIELD.NAME: INSRT_APPL_NM

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the timestamp set when the SNAP_STAT_CD was modified to show a dead sum
TARGETFIELD.NAME: UPDT_TS

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the process name that modified the SNAP_STAT_CD value.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: UPDT_APPL_NM

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This indicates whether or not the record is dead AND deleted on the TRBI T*_RC_
TARGETFIELD.NAME: TRBI_DEL_CD
